alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Northern Jasper; Northern Newton; Southern Jasper; Southern Newton; Tyler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 4:16PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Beauregard Parish, southeastern Tyler, west central Newton, northeastern Hardin and southeastern Jasper Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 416 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Buna, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Newton, Kirbyville, Call, Bon Weir, Buna, Caney Head, Trout Creek, Roganville, Old Salem, Mt. Union and Bleakwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Hardin; Northern Jasper; Northern Newton; Southern Jasper; Southern Newton; Tyler
